flowContents.comments: This flow retrieves account details from Salesforce, splits the data into individual records, applies the required transformations, converts the records into CSV format, and then posts the processed data to the API.
flowContents.name: Salesforce to Webhook

parameters.name: SalesforceQuery
parameters.value:
SELECT 
    Id,
    Name,
    Industry,
    Website,
    NumberOfEmployees,
    AnnualRevenue
FROM Account
WHERE DAY_ONLY(CreatedDate) = 2025-10-02
  AND Owner.Username = 'divija.garg613@agentforce.com'
